definition: Guo Jingming (1983-), Chinese young-adult fiction writer and teen pop idol
outer city wall
surname Guo
to respect/to venerate/to salute/to offer
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Guo Jingming is a famous writer in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，郭敬明是一位非常有名的作家。

sentences.english: The books, written by Guo Jingming, are very popular with teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 这些书是郭敬明写的，深受青少年的喜爱。

sentences.english: It's a luxury Guo Jingming is capitalizing on in every sense of the word.
sentences.chinese: 从任何一方面来说，郭敬明正在利用这种奢侈来获益。

sentences.english: Soon after, Guo was accused of plagiarizing the novel from Zhuang Yu’s “In and Out of the Circle.”
sentences.chinese: 随后，郭敬明被指控抄袭庄羽的《圈里圈外》。

sentences.english: Guo remains unbothered by the episode.
sentences.chinese: 郭敬明仍对此事件不在乎。

sentences.english: Guo paid the judgment but refused to apologize or admit any wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 郭敬明支付了赔款但拒绝道歉或承认自己做错了。

sentences.english: Even if the blog click-through rate, although the Han Han a little more, but the GJM is not bad.
sentences.chinese: 即使博客点击率，虽然韩寒多一点，但郭敬明也不差。

sentences.english: Mr. Guo, who runs a well-established publishing house, is a successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 郭敬明经营着一家知名出版社，是一个成功的商人。

sentences.english: Guo Jingming said, you are melancholy, because you have a deep memory.
sentences.chinese: 郭敬明说，你忧郁，是因为你的记忆太深刻。

sentences.english: Since the success of his novel, Guo Jingming has been much in the public eye.
sentences.chinese: 自从小说获得成功之后，郭敬明就大大地出名了。
